subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] FM Sweep & Optical Microphone
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
I can hear those. I always wonder about the religious aspects. I tended to 
disregard it most of my life, but the voices mention it sometimes, and I had 
a "jesus" image show up on my shower window over the past week.

Frank
